## IHandLostEvent interface

Event emitted by the engine if a hand was previously detected but is not recognized anymore.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IHandLostEvent 
```

## Remarks

Multiple circumstances can cause this event to occur:

<ul> <li> The hand is not visible anymore (e.g. because the user moved it outside the webcam's view). </li> <li> The user performs a hand pose that is not supported. </li> <li> The image quality is poor (e.g. due to bad lighting conditions). </li> <li> The user moves the hand too rapidly (more relevant on low-end devices). </li> </ul>

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [type](./yoha.ihandlostevent.type.md) | typeof EventEnum.LOST | Unique type ([EventEnum](./yoha.eventenum.md)<!-- -->) of this event. |
